title: EECS Best Undergraduate Research Award (Best SuperUROP Award)
description: SuperUROP is a two-semester research class for students interested in a research career. I was awarded by the MIT EECS department for being one of the top three performers in this class.

title: Leiserchess Performance Engineering Award
description: Awarded by the class staff of 6.172 Performance Engineering of Software Systems for designing and implementing the fastest chess-bot in class.
